name: Golden8bits
description: Golden8bits is a minimalistic game and Fantasy console. The game includes the possibility of creating graphics, levels, animations and music like chiptune with our own tracker; all in the same environment. No programming knowledge is needed.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel(R) Atom(TM) CPU N455 1.66GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with 512 MB RAM Storage: 16 MB available space
